message.content:
cs.DB, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.AR, cs.CE. 

This paper is primarily focused on sorting, which is a fundamental operation in databases. Therefore, cs.DB (Databases) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of GPUs to accelerate sorting, which falls under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.AR (Hardware Architecture). Additionally, the paper proposes a novel approach to reduce memory transfers, which is related to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science).
